channel.title: mandriva on Vishesh Handa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in mandriva on Vishesh Handa's blog

item.title: Status Updates
item.description: Today is the last day of 2 month long summer internship with Mandriva. It has been a fun ride. I was supposed to have been working on Metadata Sharing and improving Nepomuk’s infrastructure. Metadata sharing still has a long way to go, but I’m happy with how Nepomuk is turning out. The number of bugs have been steadily decreasing and with the introduction of the Data Management Service, we’re now ready to try out more creative uses of Nepomuk.
